title: Are we still able to rank up?
body: It says the league systems are temporarily unavailable, thus the explanation for why we don't currently have ranks. But my question is if I win will my lp go up upon the system going back up? Or will it almost be like I never played?

replies.body: This was an issue that was going on since earlier today. It may be resolved by now, so please restart your client and let me know!
